org.apparatus_templi.xml

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apparatus_templi.xml.Sensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ElementInterface

    public final class Sensor
extends Object
implements ElementInterface
    A representation of a sensor in a remote module. The sensor is expected to have a name and a value.
    Author:
    Jonathan Nelson
